text: Henri Bendel was a women's department store based in New York City. It sold women's handbags, jewelry, luxury fashion accessories, home fragrances, chocolate and gifts. Its New York City store was located at 10 West 57th street. It was founded in 1895. n September 2018, The Wall Street Journal and other media outlets reported that Henri Bendel had announced the closing of its 23 stores and ending of its brand after 123 years in business. All stores closed on January 19, 2019. Category:Retail companies of the United States Category:1895 establishments in the United States Category:2019 disestablishments in the United States
title: Henri Bendel
